page.title: 02Landuse N.of A580 at Worsley
page.content: {Landscape}-Basically flat-artificial high spot in N.W.Quadrant formed by slag heaps.Ellenbrook flows N/S. N.W.W.A. work to improve pollution from light industry & prepare for proposed open-cast mining.Much ex-colliery land still considered dangerous in parts with old slurry pits & unmarked shafts.Much new woodland predominately willow. {Buildings}-G.M.C. Fire Repair Station-handles all repairs to G.M.C. Fire Vehicles,average 80 calls a day. Red Lion-owner-Brewery Tetleys.Yew Tree-tenant-Brewery Bass.Ellenbrook church-C.E. City Rd.Chapel-Methodist. {Features}-Ellenbrook Farm-total 160 acres,not all in area.Sheep,small Fresian herd,horses for hire(7). {Industry}-An area of reclamation after heavy industrial use.
